sentences.sContent: Objective To review the experience in the diagnosis and surgical treatment of cardiac myxoma.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To review the experience in the diagnosis and surgical treatment of cardiac myxoma.
sentences.sCn: 目的探讨心脏黏液瘤的诊断和外科治疗。

sentences.sContent: Objective: To evaluate the implication of coronary arteriography in diagnosis of left atrial myxoma (LAM).
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: To evaluate the implication of coronary arteriography in diagnosis of left atrial myxoma (LAM).
sentences.sCn: 目的：评价冠状动脉（冠脉）造影对左房粘液瘤（LAM）诊断的意义。

sentences.sContent: Objective To analyse the clinical characteristics of the patients with embolic cerebrovascular disease caused by cardiac myxoma.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To analyse the clinical characteristics of the patients with embolic cerebrovascular disease caused by cardiac myxoma.
sentences.sCn: 目的分析心脏粘液瘤致栓塞性脑血管病患者的临床特点。

words.tran: 多发粘液瘤病；[肿瘤] 粘液瘤变性

trans.tranOther: a tumour composed of mucous connective tissue, usually situated in subcutaneous tissue
